title: Modern city sidewalk at night

title: Sit on rusty jeep in the forest
prompt: Keep the faces in the reference image. A stylish man wearing orage jacket with the sunglasses sits confidently on a rustic, rusty jeep amidst a dense, lush forest. The cinematic portrait captures a moody and adventurous atmosphere, with soft, natural light highlighting the weathered textures of the vehicle and the serene natural surroundings.
